events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The reported case has been classified under the Refund cluster due to request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Julia M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! I'm Julia from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 83472910. The jacket has never been worn, and the tags are still attached.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label via email.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response! I will wait for the return label.
The refund has been approved and the return label has been sent to your email. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thanks again for your help!
Your refund has been processed completely. We are closing this case now but feel free to contact us anytime.
